mil7.3.2:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘padumassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.3.2:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, padumaṃ udake jātaṃ udake saṃvaddhaṃ anupalittaṃ udakena;
mil7.3.2:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe yase sakkāre sammānanāya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, padumaṃ udakā accuggamma ṭhāti;
mil7.3.2:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokaṃ abhibhavitvā accuggamma lokuttaradhamme ṭhātabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, padumaṃ appamattakenapi anilena eritaṃ calati;
mil7.3.2:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu saṃyamo karaṇīyo, bhayadassāvinā viharitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.2:3.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū’”ti.
